titles.title: Asian Carp Prevention and Control Act
A bill to amend section 42 of title 18, United States Code, to prohibit the importation and shipment of certain species of carp.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
3/1/2007--Introduced.
Asian Carp Prevention and Control Act - Amends the Lacey Act to add specified species of black, bighead, and silver carp to the list of injurious species that are prohibited from being shipped or imported into the United States.
